column2: "prediction": "The article discusses the recent arrest of a retired major general and a colonel in connection with the Malegaon blast case. The two former military officers have been accused of helping to plan and execute the blast
column3: which occurred on September 29 in Malegaon
column4: a town in the Indian state of Maharashtra. The blast resulted in the deaths of five people and injured many others. The investigation into the blast has been ongoing
